title: ServiceNow and OpenAI Push AI Past Chatbots into Real CX Work
summary: ServiceNow and OpenAI are pushing AI beyond chatbots to address the gap between customer requests and actual resolution. This partnership could significantly impact ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and EX buyers by enhancing automation and improving customer experience.
hook: ServiceNow, OpenAI partnership: AI beyond chatbots, real CX work.

title: Omnichat Unveils Omni AI Agent Studio to Power WhatsApp Customer Interactions
summary: Omnichat has launched Omni AI Agent Studio, a tool designed to enhance customer engagement and commerce on WhatsApp using AI and conversational tools. This development could potentially influence the way ES buyers approach customer interactions and workflow automation.
hook: Omnichat's new AI tool revolutionizes WhatsApp customer interactions!

title: ServiceNow will embed OpenAI models into its AI Platform
summary: ServiceNow plans to integrate OpenAI models into its AI platform to enhance enterprise AI outcomes and build direct speech-to-speech technology. This move is significant for ITSM/ITOM/HRSM/ESM/EX buyers as it promises to break language barriers and offer more natural interactions, unlocking a new class of AI-powered automation for large companies.
hook: ServiceNow to embed OpenAI models for enhanced AI-powered automation!

title: Latest News
summary: Enghouse Interactive, a global provider of customer contact software, offers a complete portfolio of modular solutions that cover the full range of contact centre capabilities, including AI-enabled agent evaluation. The solutions are platform agnostic and integrate with various UC vendors, offering a range of deployment options to meet specific requirements.
hook: Enghouse Interactive enhances contact centre capabilities with AI

title: News
summary: Enterprise technology costs are rising due to vendor consolidation, consumption-based pricing, and market leverage, particularly for mission-critical apps like ERP, CRM, and data platforms. Oracle's investment in AI data centers may increase costs for enterprises, but also provides negotiation leverage for CIOs. Meanwhile, Meta plans to make its best AI models proprietary.
hook: Rising enterprise tech costs: Oracle's AI investment and Meta's proprietary move

title: News
summary: Oracle is enhancing its AI automation platform with new features like agent-to-agent collaboration, multi-LLM orchestration, and enterprise-grade governance. This positions Oracle as a strong contender in the AI automation market, which could impact ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and EX buyers by offering more advanced automation capabilities.
hook: Oracle steps up in AI automation race with new features.

title: News
summary: Salesforce has been acquiring companies to enhance the AI capabilities of its Agentforce and Data Cloud offerings. The company is also introducing flexible payment options for its agentic AI suite, aiming to lower the entry barrier. This matters for ITSM/ITOM/HRSM/ESM/EX buyers as it indicates a growing trend towards AI and automation in managing deployments and reducing total cost of ownership.
hook: Salesforce boosts AI capabilities, introduces flexible payment options!

title: Aaron Tan

His expertise in technology trends could influence future ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, EX, and workflow automation strategies in the region.
